loginPageDescription: [hi] Your AI-powered farming assistant. Sign in or create an account.
displayNameHelper: [hi] Shown publicly. Required for sign up.
accountCreatedToastDescription: [hi] Welcome! Your account has been successfully created.
displayNameRequiredToast: [hi] Display name is required for sign up.
geolocationNotSupportedToastDescription: [hi] Your browser does not support geolocation, or it is disabled.
fetchingWeatherForCurrentLocationToast: [hi] Fetching weather for your current location.
invalidLatLonToastDescription: [hi] Please enter valid latitude (-90 to 90) and longitude (-180 to 180).
noWeatherData: [hi] No weather data available for this location.
pestAlertsWidgetDescription: [hi] AI-generated pest alerts based on your location.
noSpecificPestAlertsDescription: [hi] Currently, no specific high-risk pest alerts for your area. See general advice below.
noPestAlertData: [hi] No pest alert data available for this location.
fetchingPestAlertsForLocationToast: [hi] Fetching pest alerts for Lat: {{lat}}, Lon: {{lon}}.
marketTrendsWidgetDescription: [hi] AI-powered insights into crop market dynamics.
noSpecificCropTrendsAvailableDescription: [hi] The AI could not identify specific crop trends for this precise location, or it's not suitable for agriculture. See general summary if available.
noMarketTrendData: [hi] No market trend data available for this location.
marketTrendsFooterDisclaimer: [hi] Market data is AI-generated, simulated, and for informational purposes only. Not financial advice.
fetchedMarketInsightsForLocationToast: [hi] Fetched market insights for Lat: {{lat}}, Lon: {{lon}}.
aiCropAdvisorCardDescription: [hi] Get AI-powered crop recommendations based on your farm data.
regionCoordinatesPlaceholder: [hi] e.g., Central Valley or Lat: 34.05, Lon: -118.24 (auto-filled)
cropHistoryPlaceholder: [hi] Describe the crops grown on your farm in recent years
currentWeatherSummaryPlaceholder: [hi] e.g., Sunny, 25°C, Low humidity (auto-filled from Weather Widget)
currentMarketDataSummaryPlaceholder: [hi] e.g., Stable corn prices, increasing demand for soy (auto-filled from Market Trends)
feedbackPlaceholder: [hi] Provide feedback on the AI recommendations (optional)
profileHistoryDescription: [hi] Review your past AI crop recommendations and inputs.
errorLoadingHistoryDetails: [hi] Could not retrieve your history at this time:
profileNotSignedIn: [hi] Please sign in to view your profile and history.
saveFailedToastDescription: [hi] Could not save AI recommendations and feedback.
